functions.name: requests_basic_auth
functions.docstring: Return an instance of request's basic auth.

functions.name: get
functions.docstring: Make a GET request to the given URL.
functions.signature:
(
    url,
    *,
    use_common_user_agent: bool = True,
    process_response: bool = False,
    process_response_as_bytes: bool = False,
    **request_kwargs,
)

functions.name: post
functions.docstring: Make a POST request to the given URL with the given data.
functions.signature:
(
    url,
    *,
    update_headers_for_datatype: bool = True,
    process_response: bool = False,
    process_response_as_bytes: bool = False,
    **request_kwargs,
)

functions.name: headers_update
functions.signature: (headers: Dict[str, str], new_header_key: str, new_header_value: Any, *, overwrite: bool = True)

functions.name: put
functions.docstring: Make a PUT request to the given URL with the given data.
functions.signature:
(
    url,
    *,
    update_headers_for_datatype: bool = True,
    process_response: bool = False,
    process_response_as_bytes: bool = False,
    **request_kwargs,
)

functions.name: delete
functions.docstring: Make a DELETE request to the given URL with the given data.
functions.signature:
(
    url,
    *,
    process_response: bool = False,
    process_response_as_bytes: bool = False,
    **request_kwargs,
)

functions.name: url_hash
functions.docstring: Return the hash of the url.

functions.name: urllib3_backoff_factor_executions
functions.docstring: Return the times (in seconds) of the first n requests with the given backoff_factor. See https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/index.html#urllib3.Retry under the "backoff_factor" argument.
